resp = client.search(
    query={
        "bool": {
            "must": [
                {
                    "match": {
                        "title": "Search"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "match": {
                        "content": "Elasticsearch"
                    }
                }
            ],
            "filter": [
                {
                    "term": {
                        "status": "published"
                    }
                },
                {
                    "range": {
                        "publish_date": {
                            "gte": "2015-01-01"
                        }
                    }
                }
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
